content: this is a digital download and not an actual product this pattern is written for beginners this pattern sheet shows you how to make the first 3 row only of an extended hexagon cardigan you can download the entire sweet hexagon cardigan pack here as well video links included for each step disclaimer ©fleetingobsessionsart2023 all information and photos are the sole property of fleeting obsessions art and krista mccloud do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way items made by this pattern made be sold as long as pattern credit is given to fleeting obsessions art via any of the hashtags or links below watch out for us on any of our socials for tutorial videos and pattern assistance subscribe to our email mailing list for up to date stitch guides as well i cannot change that the website asks for your address at checkout i don t have access to this information but you can also download it from ravelry if you are more comfy social media #fleetingobsessionsart #fleetingobsessionscrafts website https //fleetingobsessionsart squarespace com facebook fleeting obsessions | facebook tiktok @fleetingobsessionsart | tiktok instagram @fleetingobsessionsart youtube @fleetingobsessionsart
